Reviews.Title: fast shipping !
Reviews.Author: Abner Anzaldua Vega
Reviews.Content: i'm really happy with my palm centro, the shipping was super fast !. the delivery as well was pretty damn fast, and the item was exactly as the say !5 stars definely, i recomend this seller to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Works But a Few Gottas
Reviews.Author: Neon
Reviews.Content: Phone arrived in good physical condition in a generic box.  The charger is not a Palm branded one but a cheap knock-off. There was no sync cable.  No CD-ROM with the Windows/Macintosh sync software.Phone is an AT&T; branded phone that has all the standard Palm apps plus a few AT&T; apps.  Phone has been unlocked.  Works fine with a T-Mobile USA prepaid SIM.Biggest issue was after placing the battery in the phone and plugging in the charger - the phone acted flaky. Would not turn on initially. Once on, slow or wouldn't respond to key or screen presses.  Turns out the problem was the battery was shipped completely discharged.  Looks like the phone runs only off the battery and can't run off the charger.  Left the phone on the charger.  The charge light was on but hard to tell if phone was really charging. After about 45 minutes the phone was just slightly warm.  About a third charged.  Phone turned on easily.  Keys responded quickly.  The screen alignment was a bit off.  I aligned the screen.  Phone was working fine.  Put back on charger.  About 2 hours to full charge.  The non-Palm instructions that come with the phone don't suggest charging the phone first.  Says to setup phone first then charge.Bottom line.  Only buy from the Unlocked Kings if you don't want or need the USB sync cable.  And if you get one, charge the battery for 45 minutes before trying to turn on.

Reviews.Title: Defective.  Not original box.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I was excited to have ordered this phone for so cheap.But as soon as I opened the packaging, I was disappointed that it was in a generic box made by the seller (i guess) and not the original Palm box.That was ok.  For $40, i could live with OEM product.Then, I was still excited to put my sim card in and turn the product on.It wouldn't turn on.I charged it for half an hour.Still wouldn't turn on.This is my 4th palm treo so I know how to operate them.This product is defective.It's on its way back already.

Reviews.Title: this was so awful
Reviews.Author: skifreak
Reviews.Content: this phone is the worst. not only the phone itself but the customer service that was put into it as well. my daughter had a sad experience with her other phone so we ordered a simplistic texting phone to replace it. when she got the phone the first time the company had sent the wrong battery, therefore she couldn't even have the phone for another week. so we reordered it. when the phone came about 4 days later it was even worse. the product was completely defective. she read the manual cover to cover and tried to turn it on multiple times. assuming that the battery was simply dead we took it home and tried to charge it. the phones plug was completely defective. the plug fit and when we plugged into an outlet the light worked but the battery wouldn't turn on. she tried again and again and found that either the battery or the phone is defective. this was one of the worst buys we have ever made for one and it is obvious that the seller or amazon does not check the item as it goes out. this phone will be going out and will not be coming back. buying electronics from amazon is the worst. we wont make this mistake again

Reviews.Title: after a Month the software will not work
Reviews.Author: Nayrb
Reviews.Content: i bought this cellphone a month ago, and now the software is not working, I really recommend not buy this item or you'll loose your money.

Reviews.Title: used palm centro
Reviews.Author: kodi
Reviews.Content: when i lost my palm centro recently, i wanted to get the same phone, but not spend on a new one. with some trepidation i ordered a used phone from amazon, and dont regret it at all. it was in very good condition and works perfectly. got a car charger and extra stylus with it too.

Reviews.Title: Used more for its features than a cell phone
Reviews.Author: S. Grabowski
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter to replace her problematic Palm Zire. It has all the functions she is accustomed to at a very reasonable price and she is very happy with the product.I also have a Palm Centro which I use as my “smart phone”. I do not do much talking or texting so I opted for T-Mobile’s Pay-As-You-Go plan, which averages between $15 - $20 per month, depending upon my usage. The Palm Centro provides adequate reception (although there are a lot more dead spots with the provider than its competitors.) However, I bought my Palm Centro for the built-in applications that sync with the Palm Desktop and am more than happy with it.

Reviews.Title: to big
Reviews.Author: latisha smith
Reviews.Content: not made to fit in your pocket didn't come with instruction book hard to open back where battery is just don't like it

Reviews.Title: Never Buy this phone
Reviews.Author: 7 port usb squid hub
Reviews.Content: This is a useless phone. After using it for less than 3 months, the phone died by trying to Synchronize continouusly. If you cancel the Synchronization, it would start again immediately. This process would continue endlessly until the battery dies. If you charge it again, Synchronization loop would start again. This a waste of money and if you love your money, please DO NOT BUY THIS PHONE. STAY AWAY FROM PALM IF YOU DONT HAVE ANY MONEY TO WASTE.

Reviews.Title: my phone
Reviews.Author: Jimmy
Reviews.Content: Good morning, I WANT TO COMMENT ON THE PURCHASE OF THE CELL THAT DID IT, I DO NOT REALLY WORKED, AND ALSO I WANT TO COMMENT THAT THE COMPANY MADE A PHONE CALL ME TO CHANGE THE COMMENT THAT WAS MADE ME BECAUSE THEY WERE GOING TO SOLVE THE PROBLEM, AND THAT IS REMOVED AFTER THE COMMENT LEFT TO COMMUNICATE WITH ME AND MY NO MORE EMAILS ANSWERED, THAT'S WHY NOT RECOMMEND NOT MET ME AND ME AS YOU hAD SUCH

Reviews.Title: great phone!
Reviews.Author: godschild214
Reviews.Content: i needed a new phone because my current phone got messed up and i came across the palm centro. when i read the previous reviews i thought this phone would come in bad shape but it was perfect! i absolutely love it! it works great, i can honestly say theres nothing with it. yes it comes in a generic box and doesnt bring the palm brand charger, but it still works good and thats what matter. i am so grateful to God mines came perfect. i give this product thumbs up!

Reviews.Title: Why?
Reviews.Author: Michael Souffrant
Reviews.Content: The phone is okay, but it constantly cuts off when I am on the phone. Can you explain that to me please?

Reviews.Title: This Phone Is Blue But I Am Not.
Reviews.Author: An Ikearat's Brain "Tom"
Reviews.Content: First, let me say if you buy a cell phone through Amazon, try to get it from UNLOCKED CELL PHONE KINGS INC.I have bought several phones through them and every time, without exception they have delivered exactly what they are advertising, and on-time or before.This Palm Centro is BLUE really blue!Ok, there are black ones out there and I did have one of those but I had to return it on account of some sort of malfunction. I bought the blue one on price alone... I wanted the Centro -now- !Hint, use Cell Phone Kings if you want stuff fast!The only nit-pick I can come up with is, the battery cover is a slightly different color blue than the rest of the phone. Again, I don't care as I want the phone and will most likely be putting it in a case and the blue stuff will be hidden.Standard issue battery... takes a little while to recover from being in storage, just wait it out.The phone comes unlocked but covered in AT&T; logos and infested with applications that only work with AT&T;'s network. Ok, they might work with T-Mobile but I don't have a data account so I can't know.If you are a die-hard Palm user you can edit the ROM but I don't recommend that or do any of that myself. I have an Android phone I screwed-up sitting on my desk to remind me just to leave that stuff alone.Simply set all the AT&T; applications into a Category other than "Main" and you don't have to look at them. They are ROM apps so they don't take up any user memory.Several people have mentioned the boxes these phones ship in. I'm hoping my box becomes a collector's item so please go ahead and throw away all your boxes ;)

Reviews.Title: Disappointment
Reviews.Author: L. Pichardo
Reviews.Content: I was a Treo 650 user and a Palm fan, but this phone made me not want to try another palm product for the rest of my life. The phone is slower than my previous 650, and freezes randomly for no reason when I picked up a call. Went to palm forums and found out the phone has a factory problem that cause these random crashes. For me Palm is dead!

Reviews.Title: horrible service
Reviews.Author: Lynwood Watts
Reviews.Content: Obviously Amazon was trying to get rid of this phone because more than six attempts to return it was ignored and I was given the run-around.  I'm now stuck with a useless phone!

Reviews.Title: POOR POOR POOR
Reviews.Author: Cris
Reviews.Content: Im disapointed with the treatment given. I ordered this item on dic 1st and still on dic 12 havent got any response of my item.Real POOR.

ProductInfo.Features:
Palm Centro gives you voice, text, IM, email and web, all in a phone that's a lot smaller than you think
It even has a touchscreen and a full keyboard, so you can say L8R to those tricky keys on your cell phone.
Carry names and numbers, shoot photos and video, and meet up with friends.
ProductInfo.Name: Palm Centro - Smartphone - GSM - QWERTY / touch screen - Palm OS - blue
